text.en: Pile up two sets of a 18x2 and a 4x4 beams and place them on the yellow and green squares on a beam-stand (2 sets of 4x2 beams). Build a fork lift and carry the beams from the yellow corner to the red one. Then lift and carry the load from the green corner to the blue square.

Launch you fork lift from the center.
Use only one robot.
Don't use any extra material, but the parts from your kit.

You carried both loads to the designated spots within 8 minutes. = Good job! Let's try again.
You needed 6 minutes to carry the loads. = Excellent! Another try?
You carried both loads within 4 minutes. = Outstanding!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 8 minutes = 5 points
Finished within 6 minutes = 10 points
Finished within 4 minutes = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
